entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
